skills.name: Normal Attack: Favonius Bladework
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of stamina to launch an opponent using the power of wind.
Launched opponents will slowly fall to the ground.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Gale Blade
skills.description: Focusing the might of the formless wind around her blade, Jean releases a miniature storm, launching opponents in the direction she aims at, dealing massive Anemo DMG. Hold At the cost of continued stamina consumption, Jean can command the whirlwind to pull surrounding opponents and objects towards her front. Direction can be adjusted. Character is immobile during skill duration. That which follows Jean, the wholehearted defender, is a guardian wind that can banish danger from her comrades' presence.

skills.name: Dandelion Breeze
skills.description: Calling upon the wind's protection, Jean creates a swirling Dandelion Field, launching surrounding opponents and dealing Anemo DMG. At the same time, she instantly regenerates a large amount of HP for all party members. The amount of HP restored scales off Jean's ATK. Dandelion Field ·Continuously regenerates HP of characters within the AoE and continuously imbues them with Anemo. ·Deals Anemo DMG to opponents entering or exiting the Dandelion Field. Jean's magnanimity is as vast as the dandelion fields, and it is the root of her wish to protect others.

constellations.name: Spiraling Tempest
constellations.description: Increases the pulling speed of <color=#FFD780FF>Gale Blade</color> after holding for more than 1s, and increases the DMG dealt by 40%.

constellations.name: People's Aegis
constellations.description: When Jean picks up an Elemental Orb/Particle, all party members have their Movement SPD and ATK SPD increased by 15% for 15s.

constellations.name: When the West Wind Arises
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Dandelion Breeze</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Lands of Dandelion
constellations.description: Within the Field created by <color=#FFD780FF>Dandelion Breeze</color>, all opponents have their <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> decreased by 40%.

constellations.name: Outbursting Gust
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Gale Blade</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Lion's Fang, Fair Protector of Mondstadt
constellations.description: Incoming DMG is decreased by 35% within the Field created by <color=#FFD780FF>Dandelion Breeze</color>. Upon leaving the Dandelion Field, this effect lasts for 3 attacks or 10s.

passives.name: Wind Companion
passives.description: On hit, Jean's Normal Attacks have a 50% chance to regenerate HP equal to 15% of Jean's ATK for all party members.

passives.name: Let the Wind Lead
passives.description: Using <color=#FFD780FF>Dandelion Breeze</color> will regenerate 20% of its Energy.

passives.name: Guiding Breeze
passives.description: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Foreign Ironwind
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Palm Vortex
skills.description: Grasping the wind's might, you form a vortex of vacuum in your palm, causing continuous Anemo DMG to opponents in front of you. The vacuum vortex explodes when the skill duration ends, causing a greater amount of Anemo DMG over a larger area. Hold DMG and AoE will gradually increase. Elemental Absorption If the vortex comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use. You discussed the way to grasp the formless wind with Paimon.

skills.name: Gust Surge
skills.description: Guiding the path of the wind currents, you summon a forward-moving tornado that pulls objects and opponents towards itself, dealing continuous Anemo DMG. Elemental Absorption If the tornado comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use. You and Paimon studied the flapping of a butterfly's wings.

constellations.name: Raging Vortex
constellations.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Palm Vortex</color> pulls in opponents and objects within a 5m radius.

constellations.name: Uprising Whirlwind
constellations.description: Increases Energy Recharge by 16%.

constellations.name: Sweeping Gust
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Gust Surge</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Cherishing Breezes
constellations.description: Reduces DMG taken while casting <color=#FFD780FF>Palm Vortex</color> by 10%.

constellations.name: Vortex Stellaris
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Palm Vortex</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Intertwined Winds
constellations.description: Targets who take DMG from <color=#FFD780FF>Gust Surge</color> have their <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> decreased by 20%.\nIf an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

passives.name: Slitting Wind
passives.description: The last hit of a Normal Attack combo unleashes a wind blade, dealing 60% of ATK as <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color> to all opponents in its path.

passives.name: Second Wind
passives.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Palm Vortex</color> kills regenerate 2% HP for 5s. This effect can only occur once every 5s.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Foreign Rockblade
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Starfell Sword
skills.description: You disgorge a meteorite from the depths of the earth, dealing AoE Geo DMG. The meteorite is considered a Geo Construct, and can be climbed or used to block attacks. Hold This skill's positioning may be adjusted. You spoke with Paimon about the final destination of falling stars.

skills.name: Wake of Earth
skills.description: Energizing the Geo deep underground, you set off expanding shockwaves. Launches surrounding opponents back and deals AoE Geo DMG. A stone wall is erected at the edges of the shockwave. The stone wall is considered a Geo Construct, and may be used to block attacks. You and Paimon studied the pulse of the mountains.

constellations.name: Invincible Stonewall
constellations.description: Party members within the radius of <color=#FFD780FF>Wake of Earth</color> have their CRIT Rate increased by 10% and have increased resistance against interruption.

constellations.name: Rockcore Meltdown
constellations.description: When the meteorite created by <color=#FFD780FF>Starfell Sword</color> is destroyed, it will also explode, dealing additional <color=#FFE699FF>AoE Geo DMG</color> equal to the amount of damage dealt by Starfell Sword.

constellations.name: Will of the Rock
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Wake of Earth</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Reaction Force
constellations.description: The shockwave triggered by <color=#FFD780FF>Wake of Earth</color> regenerates 5 Energy for every opponent hit.\nA maximum of 25 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

constellations.name: Meteorite Impact
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Starfell Sword</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Everlasting Boulder
constellations.description: The barrier created by <color=#FFD780FF>Wake of Earth</color> lasts 5s longer.\nThe meteorite created by <color=#FFD780FF>Starfell Sword</color> lasts 10s longer.

passives.name: Shattered Darkrock
passives.description: Reduces <color=#FFD780FF>Starfell Sword</color>'s CD by 2s.

passives.name: Frenzied Rockslide
passives.description: The final hit of a Normal Attack combo triggers a collapse, dealing 60% of ATK as <color=#FFE708FF>AoE Geo DMG</color>.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Lightning Touch
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 4 lightning attacks that deal <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal <color=#FFACFFFF>AoE Electro DMG</color> after a short casting time.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Gathering the might of Electro, Lisa plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals <color=#FFACFFFF>AoE Electro DMG</color> upon impact with the ground.

skills.name: Violet Arc
skills.description: #Channels the power of lightning to sweep bothersome matters away. {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tap}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} Releases a homing Lightning Orb. On hit, it deals Electro DMG and applies a stack of the Conductive status (max 3 stacks) to opponents in a small AoE. Hold After an extended casting time, calls down lightning from the heavens, dealing massive Electro DMG to all nearby opponents. Deals great amounts of extra damage to opponents based on the number of Conductive stacks applied to them, and clears their Conductive status. Electro Purple is the raiment of the Witch of Purple Rose.

skills.name: Lightning Rose
skills.description: Summons a Lightning Rose that unleashes powerful lightning bolts, launching surrounding opponents and dealing Electro DMG. The Lightning Rose will continuously emit lightning to knock back opponents and deal Electro DMG throughout the ability's duration. This rose is beautiful, but beware its mortal thorns.

constellations.name: Infinite Circuit
constellations.description: Lisa regenerates 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding <color=#FFD780FF>Violet Arc</color>.\nA maximum of 10 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

constellations.name: Electromagnetic Field
constellations.description: Holding <color=#FFD780FF>Violet Arc</color> has the following effects:\n·Increases DEF by 25%.\n·Increases Lisa's resistance to interruption.

constellations.name: Resonant Thunder
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Lightning Rose</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Plasma Eruption
constellations.description: Increases the number of lightning bolts released by <color=#FFD780FF>Lightning Rose</color> by 1-3.

constellations.name: Electrocute
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Violet Arc</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Pulsating Witch
constellations.description: When Lisa takes the field, she applies 3 stacks of <color=#FFD780FF>Violet Arc</color>'s Conductive status onto nearby opponents.\nThis effect can only occur once every 5s.

passives.name: Induced Aftershock
passives.description: Hits by Charged Attacks apply <color=#FFD780FF>Violet Arc</color>'s Conductive status to opponents.

passives.name: Static Electricity Field
passives.description: Opponents hit by <color=#FFD780FF>Lightning Rose</color> have their DEF decreased by 15% for 10s.

passives.name: General Pharmaceutics
passives.description: When Lisa crafts a potion, she has a 20% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.

skills.description:

skills.name: Normal Attack: Whisper of Water
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 4 water splash attacks that deal <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal <color=#80C0FFFF>AoE Hydro DMG</color> after a short casting time.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Gathering the might of Hydro, Barbara plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals <color=#80C0FFFF>AoE Hydro DMG</color> upon impact with the ground.

skills.name: Let the Show Begin♪
skills.description: Summons water droplets resembling musical notes that form a Melody Loop, dealing Hydro DMG to surrounding opponents and applying the Wet status to them. Melody Loop ·On hit, Barbara's Normal Attacks heal your own party members and nearby teammates for a certain amount of HP, which scales with Barbara's Max HP. ·On hit, Barbara's Charged Attack generates 4 times the amount of healing. ·Periodically regenerates your own active character's HP. ·Applies the Wet status to the character and to opponents who come in contact with them. Barbara's music is the magic that heals her companions.

skills.name: Shining Miracle♪
skills.description: Heals your own party members and nearby teammates for a large amount of HP that scales with Barbara's Max HP. Barbara's desire to heal strengthens her will to fight and sing.

constellations.name: Gleeful Songs
constellations.description: Barbara regenerates 1 Energy every 10s.

constellations.name: Vitality Burst
constellations.description: Decreases the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Let the Show Begin♪</color> by 15%.\nDuring the ability's duration, your active character gains a 15% <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG Bonus</color>.

constellations.name: Star of Tomorrow
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Shining Miracle♪</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Attentiveness be My Power
constellations.description: Every opponent Barbara hits with her Charged Attack regenerates 1 Energy for her.\nA maximum of 5 energy can be regenerated in this manner with any one Charged Attack.

constellations.name: The Purest Companionship
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Let the Show Begin♪</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Dedicating Everything to You
constellations.description:
When Barbara is in the party but not on the field, and one of your own party members falls:
·Automatically revives the fallen character.
·Fully restores the revived character's HP to 100%.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

passives.name: Glorious Season
passives.description: The Stamina Consumption of characters within <color=#FFD780FF>Let the Show Begin♪</color>'s Melody Loop is reduced by 12%.

passives.name: Encore
passives.description: When your active character gains an Elemental Orb/Particle, the duration of the Melody Loop of <color=#FFD780FF>Let the Show Begin♪</color> is extended by 1s.\nThe maximum extension is 5s.

passives.name: With My Whole Heart♪
passives.description: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Ceremonial Bladework
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Frostgnaw
skills.description: Unleashes a frigid blast, dealing Cryo DMG to opponents in front of Kaeya. Kaeya seems affable, but his nature is that of unyielding ice.

skills.name: Glacial Waltz
skills.description: Coalescing the frost in the air, Kaeya summons 3 icicles that revolve around him. These icicles will follow the character around and deal Cryo DMG to opponents in their path for the ability's duration. A winsome smile, genial words, and the merciless hoarfrost that lies beneath... These are all Kaeya's weapons.

constellations.name: Excellent Blood
constellations.description: The CRIT Rate of Kaeya's Normal and Charge Attacks against opponents affected by <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color> is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Never-Ending Performance
constellations.description: Every time <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Waltz</color> defeats an opponent during its duration, its duration is increased by 2.5s, up to a maximum of 15s.

constellations.name: Dance of Frost
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Frostgnaw</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Frozen Kiss
constellations.description:
Triggers automatically when Kaeya's HP falls below 20%:
Creates a shield that absorbs damage equal to 30% of Kaeya's Max HP. Lasts for 20s.
This shield absorbs <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> with 250% efficiency.
Can only occur once every 60s.

constellations.name: Frostbiting Embrace
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Waltz</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Glacial Whirlwind
constellations.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Waltz</color> will generate 1 additional icicle, and will regenerate 15 Energy when cast.

passives.name: Cold-Blooded Strike
passives.description: Every hit with <color=#FFD780FF>Frostgnaw</color> regenerates HP for Kaeya equal to 15% of his ATK.

passives.name: Glacial Heart
passives.description: Opponents <color=#99FFFFFF>Frozen</color> by <color=#FFD780FF>Frostgnaw</color> will drop additional Elemental Particles.\nFrostgnaw may only produce a maximum of 2 additional Elemental Particles per use.

passives.name: Hidden Strength
passives.description: Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.\nNot stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Tempered Sword
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes.
At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Searing Onslaught
skills.description: Performs a forward slash that deals Pyro DMG. This skill can be consecutively used 3 times. Enters CD if not cast again within a short period. The slashes represent the values that Diluc holds dear: one for justice, one for courage, and one for duty.

skills.name: Dawn
skills.description: Releases intense flames to knock back nearby opponents, dealing Pyro DMG. The flames then converge into the weapon, summoning a Phoenix that flies forward and deals massive Pyro DMG to all opponents in its path. The Phoenix explodes upon reaching its destination, causing a large amount of AoE Pyro DMG. The searing flames that run down his blade cause it to be infused with Pyro. The only reason to walk in the darkness is to light it up. Behold, that fleeing light in the dead of night is the herald of the coming dawn.

constellations.name: Conviction
constellations.description: Diluc deals 15% more DMG to opponents whose HP is above 50%.

constellations.name: Searing Ember
constellations.description: When Diluc takes DMG, his ATK increases by 10% and his ATK SPD increases by 5%. Lasts for 10s.\nThis effect can stack up to 3 times and can only occur once every 1.5s.

constellations.name: Fire and Steel
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Searing Onslaught</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Flowing Flame
constellations.description: Casting <color=#FFD780FF>Searing Onslaught</color> in rhythm greatly increases damage dealt.\n2s after casting <color=#FFD780FF>Searing Onslaught</color>, casting the next Searing Onslaught in the combo deals 40% additional DMG. This effect lasts for 2s.

constellations.name: Phoenix, Harbinger of Dawn
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Dawn</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Flaming Sword, Nemesis of the Dark
constellations.description: After casting <color=#FFD780FF>Searing Onslaught</color>, the next 2 Normal Attacks within the next 6s will have their DMG and ATK SPD increased by 30%.\nAdditionally, Searing Onslaught will not interrupt the Normal Attack combo.

passives.name: Relentless
passives.description: Diluc's Charged Attack Stamina Cost is decreased by 50%, and its duration is increased by 3s.

passives.name: Blessing of Phoenix
passives.description: The <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro Infusion</color> provided by <color=#FFD780FF>Dawn</color> lasts for 4s longer. Additionally, Diluc gains 20% <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> during the duration of this effect.

passives.name: Tradition of the Dawn Knight
passives.description: Refunds 15% of the ore used when crafting Claymore-type weapons.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Steel Fang
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents.
At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash. 

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Claw and Thunder
skills.description: #Hunts his prey using the techniques taught to him by his master and his lupical. {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tap}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} Swings the Thunder Wolf Claw, dealing Electro DMG to opponents in front of Razor. Upon striking an opponent, Razor will gain an Electro Sigil, which increases his Energy Recharge rate. Razor can have up to 3 Electro Sigils simultaneously, and gaining a new Electro Sigil refreshes their duration. Hold Gathers Electro energy to unleash a lightning storm over a small AoE, causing massive Electro DMG, and clears all of Razor's Electro Sigils. Each Electro Sigil cleared in this manner will be converted into Energy for Razor. In the moment when lightning strikes, you can sometimes glimpse the look of a predator sizing up his prey deep within Razor's eyes.

skills.name: Lightning Fang
skills.description: Summons the Wolf Within, which deals Electro DMG to all nearby opponents. This clears all of Razor's Electro Sigils, which will be converted into Elemental Energy for him. The Wolf Within will fight alongside Razor for the skill's duration. The Wolf Within ·Strikes alongside Razor's normal attacks, dealing Electro DMG. ·Raises Razor's ATK SPD and Electro RES. ·Causes Razor to be immune to DMG inflicted by the Electro-Charged status. ·Disables Razor's Charged Attacks. ·Increases Razor's resistance to interruption. These effects end when Razor leaves the battlefield. When Razor leaves the field, a maximum of 10 Energy will be returned to him based off the duration remaining on this skill. The wolf has awoken. The hunt is on.

constellations.name: Wolf's Instinct
constellations.description: Picking up an Elemental Orb or Particle increases Razor's DMG by 10% for 8s.

constellations.name: Suppression
constellations.description: Increases CRIT Rate against opponents with less than 30% HP by 10%.

constellations.name: Soul Companion
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Lightning Fang</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Bite
constellations.description: #When casting <color=#FFD780FF>Claw and Thunder</color> ({LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tap}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press}), opponents hit will have their DEF decreased by 15% for 7s.

constellations.name: Sharpened Claws
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Claw and Thunder</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Lupus Fulguris
constellations.description: Every 10s, Razor's sword charges up, causing the next Normal Attack to release lightning that deals 100% of Razor's ATK as <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>.\nWhen Razor is not using <color=#FFD780FF>Lightning Fang</color>, a lightning strike on an opponent will grant Razor an Electro Sigil for <color=#FFD780FF>Claw and Thunder</color>.

passives.name: Awakening
passives.description: Decreases <color=#FFD780FF>Claw and Thunder</color>'s CD by 18%.\nUsing <color=#FFD780FF>Lightning Fang</color> resets the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Claw and Thunder</color>.

passives.name: Hunger
passives.description: When Razor's Energy is below 50%, increases Energy Recharge by 30%.

passives.name: Wolvensprint
passives.description: Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.\nNot stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Sharpshooter
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Perform a more precise <color=#FFD780FF>Aimed Shot</color> with increased DMG.
While aiming, flames will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged flaming arrow will deal <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Explosive Puppet
skills.description: The ever-reliable Baron Bunny takes the stage. Baron Bunny ·Continuously taunts the enemy, drawing their fire. ·Baron Bunny's HP scales with Amber's Max HP. ·When destroyed or when its timer expires, Baron Bunny explodes, dealing AoE Pyro DMG. Hold Adjusts the throwing direction of Baron Bunny. The longer the button is held, the further the throw. Baron Bunny hails from a storied lineage, but Amber has stopped keeping count since Baron Bunny the 893rd.

skills.name: Fiery Rain
skills.description: Fires off a shower of arrows, dealing continuous AoE Pyro DMG. Amber's passion truly burns hot.

constellations.name: One Arrow to Rule Them All
constellations.description: Fires 2 arrows per <color=#FFD780FF>Aimed Shot</color>. The second arrow deals 20% of the first arrow's DMG.

constellations.name: Bunny Triggered
constellations.description: Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting Baron Bunny's foot with a fully-charged Aimed Shot manually detonates it.\nExplosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.

constellations.name: It Burns!
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Fiery Rain</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: It's Not Just Any Doll...
constellations.description: Decreases <color=#FFD780FF>Explosive Puppet</color>'s CD by 20%. Adds 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: It's Baron Bunny!
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Explosive Puppet</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Wildfire
constellations.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Fiery Rain</color> increases all party members' Movement SPD by 15% and ATK by 15% for 10s.

passives.name: Every Arrow Finds Its Target
passives.description: Increases the CRIT Rate of <color=#FFD780FF>Fiery Rain</color> by 10% and widens its AoE by 30%.

passives.name: Precise Shot
passives.description: Aimed Shot hits on weak points increase ATK by 15% for 10s.

passives.name: Gliding Champion
passives.description: Decreases gliding Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.\nNot stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Divine Marksmanship
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Perform a more precise <color=#FFD780FF>Aimed Shot</color> with increased DMG.
While aiming, favorable winds will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged wind arrow will deal <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Skyward Sonnet
skills.description: #O wind upon which all hymns and songs fly, bear these earth-walkers up into the sky! {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tap}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} Summons a Wind Domain at the opponent's location, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching opponents into the air. Hold Summons an even larger Wind Domain with Venti as the epicenter, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching affected opponents into the air. After unleashing the Hold version of this ability, Venti rides the wind into the air. Opponents hit by Skyward Sonnet will fall to the ground slowly. In the days when gods and men walked the earth together, the heavens were filled with countless songs. This melody has long since been forgotten.

skills.name: Wind's Grand Ode
skills.description: Fires off an arrow made of countless coalesced winds, creating a huge Stormeye that sucks in opponents and deals continuous Anemo DMG. Elemental Absorption If the Stormeye comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use. Many hymns written in praise of the Anemo Archon have been lost to time. This one sings of his mastery over the wind.

constellations.name: Splitting Gales
constellations.description: Fires 2 additional arrows per <color=#FFD780FF>Aimed Shot</color>, each dealing 33% of the original arrow's DMG.

constellations.name: Breeze of Reminiscence
constellations.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Skyward Sonnet</color> decreases opponents' <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> and Physical RES by 12% for 10s.\nOpponents launched by <color=#FFD780FF>Skyward Sonnet</color> suffer an additional 12% <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> and Physical RES decrease while airborne.

constellations.name: Ode to Thousand Winds
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Wind's Grand Ode</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Hurricane of Freedom
constellations.description: When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG Bonus</color> for 10s.

constellations.name: Concerto dal Cielo
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Skyward Sonnet</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Storm of Defiance
constellations.description: Targets who take DMG from <color=#FFD780FF>Wind's Grand Ode</color> have their <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> decreased by 20%.\nIf an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

passives.name: Embrace of Winds
passives.description: Holding <color=#FFD780FF>Skyward Sonnet</color> creates an upcurrent that lasts for 20s.

passives.name: Stormeye
passives.description: Regenerates 15 Energy for Venti after the effects of <color=#FFD780FF>Wind's Grand Ode</color> end.\nIf an Elemental Absorption occurred, this also restores 15 Energy to all characters of that corresponding element in the party.

passives.name: Windrider
passives.description: Decreases gliding Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.\nNot stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Dough-Fu
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to five consecutive spear strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Guoba Attack
skills.description: Summons Guoba the Panda. Guoba continuously breathes fire at opponents, dealing AoE Pyro DMG. Guoba loves to eat spicy food. Problem is, his stomach can't handle something this spicy.

skills.name: Pyronado
skills.description: Displaying her mastery over both fire and polearms, Xiangling sends a Pyronado whirling around her. The Pyronado will move with your character for the ability's duration, dealing Pyro DMG to all opponents in its path. There will never be enough heat. Never.

constellations.name: Crispy Outside, Tender Inside
constellations.description: Opponents hit by Guoba's attacks have their <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro RES</color> reduced by 15% for 6s.

constellations.name: Oil Meets Fire
constellations.description: The last attack in a Normal Attack sequence applies the Implode status onto the opponent for 2s. An explosion will occur once this duration ends, dealing 75% of Xiangling's ATK as <color=#FF9999FF>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.

constellations.name: Deepfry
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Pyronado</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Slowbake
constellations.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Pyronado</color>'s duration is increased by 40%.

constellations.name: Guoba Mad
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Guoba Attack</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Condensed Pyronado
constellations.description: For the duration of <color=#FFD780FF>Pyronado</color>, all party members receive a 15% <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG Bonus</color>.

passives.name: Crossfire
passives.description: Increases the flame range of Guoba by 20%.

passives.name: Beware, It's Super Hot!
passives.description: When <color=#FFD780FF>Guoba Attack</color>'s effect ends, Guoba leaves a chili pepper on the spot where it disappeared. Picking up a chili pepper increases ATK by 10% for 10s.

passives.name: Chef de Cuisine
passives.description: When Xiangling cooks an ATK-boosting dish perfectly, she has a 12% chance to receive double the product.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Oceanborne
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 5 consecutive strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes.
At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Tidecaller
skills.description: #Nothing to worry about. Should anyone raise a hand against her or her men, she will avenge it ten-fold with sword and thunder. {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tap}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} Accumulating the power of lightning, Beidou swings her blade forward fiercely, dealing Electro DMG. Hold Lifts her weapon up as a shield. Max DMG absorbed scales off Beidou's Max HP. Attacks using the energy stored within the greatsword upon release or once this ability's duration expires, dealing Electro DMG. DMG dealt scales with the number of times Beidou is attacked in the skill's duration. The greatest DMG Bonus will be attained once this effect is triggered twice. The shield possesses the following properties: ·Has 250% Electro DMG Absorption Efficiency. ·Applies the Electro element to Beidou upon activation. Conquer the high seas! Pursue the waves and chase the storm!

skills.name: Stormbreaker
skills.description: Recalling her slaying of the great beast Haishan, Beidou calls upon that monstrous strength and the lightning to create a Thunderbeast's Targe around herself, dealing Electro DMG to nearby opponents. Thunderbeast's Targe ·When Normal and Charged Attacks hit, they create a lightning discharge that can jump between opponents, dealing Electro DMG. ·Increases the character's resistance to interruption, and decreases DMG taken. A maximum of 1 lightning discharge can be triggered per second. With a peal of thunder, Haishan is slain.

constellations.name: Sea Beast's Scourge
constellations.description: When <color=#FFD780FF>Stormbreaker</color> is used:\nCreates a shield that absorbs up to 16% of Beidou's Max HP for 15s.\nThis shield absorbs <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> 250% more effectively.

constellations.name: Upon the Turbulent Sea, the Thunder Arises
constellations.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Stormbreaker</color>'s arc lightning can jump to 2 additional targets.

constellations.name: Summoner of Storm
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Tidecaller</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Stunning Revenge
constellations.description: Within 10s of taking DMG, Beidou's Normal Attacks gain 20% additional <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>.

constellations.name: Crimson Tidewalker
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Stormbreaker</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Bane of Evil
constellations.description: During the duration of <color=#FFD780FF>Stormbreaker</color>, the <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro RES</color> of surrounding opponents is decreased by 15%.

passives.name: Retribution
passives.description: Counterattacking with <color=#FFD780FF>Tidecaller</color> at the precise moment when the character is hit grants the maximum DMG Bonus.

passives.name: Lightning Storm
passives.description: Gain the following effects for 10s after unleashing <color=#FFD780FF>Tidecaller</color> with its maximum DMG Bonus: \n·DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 15%. ATK SPD of Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 15%.\n·Greatly reduced delay before unleashing Charged Attacks.

passives.name: Conqueror of Tides
passives.description: Decreases swimming Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.\nNot stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Guhua Style
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen
skills.description: Xingqiu performs twin strikes with his sword, dealing Hydro DMG. At the same time, this ability creates the maximum number of Rain Swords, which will orbit your active character. The Rain Swords have the following properties: ·When a character takes DMG, the Rain Sword will shatter, reducing the amount of DMG taken. ·Increases the character's resistance to interruption. 20% of Xingqiu's Hydro DMG Bonus will be converted to additional DMG Reduction for the Rain Swords. The maximum amount of additional DMG Reduction that can be gained this way is 24%. The initial maximum number of Rain Swords is 3. Using this ability applies the Wet status onto the character. "Easier to slay a rain dragon than to sever the rain."

skills.name: Guhua Sword: Raincutter
skills.description: Initiate Rainbow Bladework and fight using an illusory sword rain, while creating the maximum number of Rain Swords. Rainbow Bladework ·Your active character's Normal Attacks will trigger consecutive sword rain attacks, dealing Hydro DMG. ·Rain Swords will remain at the maximum number throughout the ability's duration. The "Way of the Rain Cutter" is one of the esoteric secret techniques of the Guhua Sect.

constellations.name: The Scent Remained
constellations.description: Increases the maximum number of Rain Swords by 1.

constellations.name: Rainbow Upon the Azure Sky
constellations.description: Extends the duration of <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color> by 3s.\nDecreases the <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro RES</color> of opponents hit by sword rain attacks by 15% for 4s.

constellations.name: Weaver of Verses
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Evilsoother
constellations.description: Throughout the duration of <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color>, the DMG dealt by <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen</color> is increased by 50%.

constellations.name: Embrace of Rain
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Hence, Call Them My Own Verses
constellations.description: Activating 2 of <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color>'s sword rain attacks greatly enhances the third sword rain attack. On hit, the third sword rain attack also regenerates 3 Energy for Xingqiu.

passives.name: Hydropathic
passives.description: When a Rain Sword is shattered or when its duration expires, it regenerates the current character's HP based on 6% of Xingqiu's Max HP.

passives.name: Blades Amidst Raindrops
passives.description: Xingqiu gains a 20% <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG Bonus</color>.

passives.name: Flash of Genius
passives.description: When Xingqiu crafts Character Talent Materials, he has a 25% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Whirlwind Thrust
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 6 consecutive spear strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform an upward thrust.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
Xiao does not take DMG from performing Plunging Attacks.

skills.name: Lemniscatic Wind Cycling
skills.description: Xiao lunges forward, dealing Anemo DMG to opponents in his path. Can be used in mid-air. Starts with 2 charges. According to the legends of another land, the world will someday be crushed by two great wind wheels. Xiao's mastery over polearms is transcendent, ripping his foes apart like those legendary wind wheels.

skills.name: Bane of All Evil
skills.description: Xiao dons the Yaksha Mask that set gods and demons trembling millennia ago. Yaksha's Mask ·Greatly increases Xiao's jumping ability. ·Increases his attack AoE and attack DMG. ·Converts attack DMG into Anemo DMG, which cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion. In this state, Xiao will continuously lose HP. The effects of this skill end when Xiao leaves the field. Donning the Mask of the Yaksha, Xiao takes the terrifying, demon-conquering form of the Vigilant Yaksha. But this great power has also brought him great suffering. Some call him "The Bane of All Evil."
