Normal Attack/Charged Attack/Plunging Attack DMG Bonus

constellations.name: Dissolution Eon: Destroyer of Worlds
constellations.description: Increases <color=#FFD780FF>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color>'s charges by 1.

constellations.name: Annihilation Eon: Blossom of Kaleidos
constellations.description: When in the party and not on the field, Xiao's Energy Recharge is increased by 25%.

constellations.name: Conqueror of Evil: Wrath Deity
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Transcension: Extinction of Suffering
constellations.description: When Xiao's HP falls below 50%, he gains a 100% DEF Bonus.

constellations.name: Evolution Eon: Origin of Ignorance
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Bane of All Evil</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Conqueror of Evil: Guardian Yaksha
constellations.description: While under the effects of <color=#FFD780FF>Bane of All Evil</color>, hitting at least 2 opponents with Xiao's Plunging Attack will immediately grant him 1 charge of <color=#FFD780FF>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color>, and for the next 1s, he may use Lemniscatic Wind Cycling while ignoring its CD.

passives.name: Conqueror of Evil: Tamer of Demons
passives.description: While under the effects of <color=#FFD780FF>Bane of All Evil</color>, all DMG dealt by Xiao increases by 5%. DMG increases by a further 5% for every 3s the ability persists.\nThe maximum DMG Bonus is 25%.

passives.name: Dissolution Eon: Heaven Fall
passives.description: Using <color=#FFD780FF>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color> increases the DMG of subsequent uses of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling by 15%.\nThis effect lasts for 7s, and has a maximum of 3 stacks. Gaining a new stack refreshes the effect's duration.

passives.name: Transcension: Gravity Defier
passives.description: Decreases climbing Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.\nNot stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Sparkling Scatter
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Shoots gems that deal <color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>.
Upon hit, this grants Ningguang 1 Star Jade.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of stamina to fire off a giant gem that deals <color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>.
If Ningguang has any Star Jades, unleashing a Charged Attack will cause the Star Jades to be fired at the enemy as well, dealing additional DMG.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Gathering the might of Geo, Ningguang plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals <color=#FFE699FF>AoE Geo DMG</color> upon impact with the ground.

skills.name: Jade Screen
skills.description: Ningguang creates a Jade Screen out of gold, obsidian and her great opulence, dealing AoE Geo DMG. Jade Screen ·Blocks opponents' projectiles. ·Endurance scales based on Ningguang's Max HP. Jade Screen is considered a Geo Construct and can be used to block certain attacks, but cannot be climbed. Only one Jade Screen may exist at any one time. The canvas of stars is written upon this jade screen.

skills.name: Starshatter
skills.description: Gathering a great number of gems, Ningguang scatters them all at once, sending homing projectiles at her opponents that deal massive Geo DMG. If Starshatter is cast when a Jade Screen is nearby, the Jade Screen will fire additional gem projectiles at the same time. Stars shatter. Silence falls.

constellations.name: Piercing Fragments
constellations.description: When a Normal Attack hits, it deals AoE DMG.

constellations.name: Shock Effect
constellations.description: When <color=#FFD780FF>Jade Screen</color> is shattered, its CD will reset.\nCan occur once every 6s.

constellations.name: Majesty be the Array of Stars
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Starshatter</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Exquisite be the Jade, Outshining All Beneath
constellations.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Jade Screen</color> increases nearby characters' Elemental RES by 10%.

constellations.name: Invincible be the Jade Screen
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Jade Screen</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Grandeur be the Seven Stars
constellations.description: When <color=#FFD780FF>Starshatter</color> is used, Ningguang gains 7 Star Jades.

passives.name: Backup Plan
passives.description: When Ningguang is in possession of Star Jades, her Charged Attack does not consume Stamina.

passives.name: Strategic Reserve
passives.description: A character that passes through the <color=#FFD780FF>Jade Screen</color> will gain a 12% <color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG Bonus</color> for 10s.

passives.name: Trove of Marvelous Treasures
passives.description: Displays the location of nearby <color=#FFD780FF>ore veins</color> (Iron Ore, White Iron Ore, Crystal Ore, Magical Crystal Ore, and Starsilver) on the mini-map.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Kaboom!
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Throws things that go boom when they hit things! Perform up to 3 explosive attacks, dealing <color=#FF9999FF>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals <color=#FF9999FF>AoE Pyro DMG</color> to opponents after a short casting time.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Gathering the power of Pyro, Klee plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals <color=#FF9999FF>AoE Pyro DMG</color> upon impact with the ground.

skills.name: Jumpy Dumpty
skills.description: Jumpy Dumpty is tons of boom-bang-fun! When thrown, Jumpy Dumpty bounces thrice, igniting and dealing AoE Pyro DMG with every bounce. On the third bounce, the bomb splits into many mines. The mines will explode upon contact with opponents, or after a short period of time, dealing AoE Pyro DMG. Starts with 2 charges. Jumpy Dumpty is Klee's good friend! She can't help but introduce him to everyone.

skills.name: Sparks 'n' Splash
skills.description: Klee's Blazing Delight! For the duration of this ability, continuously summons Sparks 'n' Splash to attack nearby opponents, dealing AoE Pyro DMG. The knights all believe that Klee must have a lucky star watching over her to have never been hurt by any of her own bombs...

constellations.name: Chained Reactions
constellations.description: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon sparks that bombard opponents, dealing DMG equal to 120% of <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color>'s DMG.

constellations.name: Explosive Frags
constellations.description: Being hit by <color=#FFD780FF>Jumpy Dumpty</color>'s mines decreases opponents' DEF by 23% for 10s.

constellations.name: Exquisite Compound
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Jumpy Dumpty</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sparkly Explosion
constellations.description: If Klee leaves the field during the duration of <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color>, her departure triggers an explosion that deals 555% of her ATK as <color=#FF9999FF>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.

constellations.name: Nova Burst
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Blazing Delight
constellations.description: While under the effects of <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color>, Klee will regenerate 3 Energy for all members of the party (excluding Klee) every 3s.\nWhen <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color> is used, all party members will gain a 10% <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> for 25s.

passives.name: Pounding Surprise
passives.description: When <color=#FFD780FF>Jumpy Dumpty</color> and Normal Attacks deal DMG, Klee has a 50% chance to obtain an Explosive Spark.\nThis Explosive Spark is consumed by the next Charged Attack, which costs no Stamina and deals 50% increased DMG.

passives.name: Sparkling Burst
passives.description: When Klee's Charged Attack results in a CRIT Hit, all party members gain 2 Elemental Energy.

passives.name: All Of My Treasures!
passives.description: Displays the location of nearby <color=#FFD780FF>resources unique to Mondstadt</color> on the mini-map.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Rain of Stone
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 6 consecutive spear strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, causing stone spears to fall along his path.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Dominus Lapidis
skills.description: #Every mountain, rock and inch of land is filled with the power of Geo, but those who can wield such powers freely are few and far between. {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tap}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} Commands the power of earth to create a Stone Stele. Hold Causes nearby Geo energy to explode, causing the following effects: ·If their maximum number hasn't been reached, creates a Stone Stele. ·Creates a shield of jade. The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Zhongli's Max HP. ·Deals AoE Geo DMG. ·If there are nearby targets with the Geo element, it will drain a large amount of Geo element from a maximum of 2 such targets. This effect does not cause DMG. Stone Stele When created, deals AoE Geo DMG. Additionally, it will intermittently resonate with other nearby Geo constructs, dealing Geo DMG to nearby opponents. The Stone Stele is considered a Geo construct that can both be climbed and used to block attacks. Only one Stele created by Zhongli himself may initially exist at any one time. Jade Shield Possesses 150% DMG Absorption against all Elemental and Physical DMG. Characters protected by the Jade Shield will decrease the Elemental RES and Physical RES of opponents in a small AoE by 20%. This effect cannot be stacked. A true master of stone may carve jade and shape gold.

skills.name: Planet Befall
skills.description: Brings a falling meteor down to earth, dealing massive Geo DMG to opponents caught in its AoE and applying the Petrification status to them. Petrification Opponents affected by the Petrification status cannot move. The falling meteor punishes the unjust.

constellations.name: Rock, the Backbone of Earth
constellations.description: Increases the maximum number of Stone Steles created by <color=#FFD780FF>Dominus Lapidis</color> that may exist simultaneously to 2.

constellations.name: Stone, the Cradle of Jade
constellations.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Planet Befall</color> grants nearby characters on the field a Jade Shield when it descends.

constellations.name: Jade, Shimmering through Darkness
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Dominus Lapidis</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Topaz, Unbreakable and Fearless
constellations.description: Increases <color=#FFD780FF>Planet Befall</color>'s AoE by 20% and increases the duration of Planet Befall's Petrification effect by 2s.

constellations.name: Lazuli, Herald of the Order
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Planet Befall</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Chrysos, Bounty of Dominator
constellations.description: When the Jade Shield takes DMG, 40% of that incoming DMG is converted to HP for the current character.\nA single instance of regeneration cannot exceed 8% of that character's Max HP.

passives.name: Resonant Waves
passives.description: When the Jade Shield takes DMG, it will Fortify:\n·Fortified characters have 5% increased Shield Strength.\nCan stack up to 5 times, and lasts until the Jade Shield disappears.

passives.name: Dominance of Earth
passives.description:
Zhongli deals bonus DMG based on his Max HP:
·Normal Attack, Charged Attack, and Plunging Attack DMG is increased by 1.39% of Max HP.
·<color=#FFD780FF>Dominus Lapidis'</color> Stone Stele, resonance, and hold DMG is increased by 1.9% of Max HP.
·<color=#FFD780FF>Planet Befall's</color> DMG is increased by 33% of Max HP.

passives.name: Arcanum of Crystal
passives.description: Refunds 15% of the ore used when crafting Polearm-type weapons.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Bolts of Downfall
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Perform a more precise <color=#FFD780FF>Aimed Shot</color> with increased DMG.
While aiming, the dark lightning spirits of Immernachtreich shall heed the call of their Prinzessin and indwell the enchanted arrowhead. When fully indwelt, the Rachsüchtig Blitz shall deal immense <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Nightrider
skills.description: #Summons Oz. The night raven forged of darkness and lightning descends upon the land, dealing Electro DMG in a small AoE. For the ability's duration, Oz will continuously attack nearby opponents with Freikugel. Hold to adjust the location Oz will be summoned to. {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tap}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} again any time during the ability's duration to once again summon him to Fischl's side. "My time is most precious, and I shall not waste it on the likes of you... Go, Oz, fall upon them, and bring down upon them your Rachsüchtig Blitz, that which tears open the long night." —Flowers for Princess Fischl (IV): Farewell Frau Welt

skills.name: Midnight Phantasmagoria
skills.description: Summons Oz to spread his twin wings of twilight and defend Fischl. Has the following properties during the ability's duration: ·Fischl takes on Oz's form, greatly increasing her Movement Speed. ·Strikes nearby opponents with lightning, dealing Electro DMG to opponents she comes into contact with. Each opponent can only be struck once. ·Once this ability's effects end, Oz will remain on the battlefield and attack his Prinzessin's foes. If Oz is already on the field, then this will reset the duration of his presence. "...In the hordes of beasts that follow the cursed blood, only Prince Nachtraben, who bore witness to the extinction of a thousand worlds, knows her true greatness. Thus the night wings he spreads are his eternal promise to protect Her Royal Highness." —Flowers for Princess Fischl (I): End Time Zersetzung

constellations.name: Gaze of the Deep
constellations.description: Even when Oz is not present in combat, he can still watch over Fischl through his raven eyes. When Fischl performs a Normal Attack against an opponent, Oz fires a joint attack, dealing DMG equal to 22% of Fischl's ATK.

constellations.name: Devourer of All Sins
constellations.description: When <color=#FFD780FF>Nightrider</color> is used, it deals an additional 200% ATK as DMG, and its AoE is increased by 50%.

constellations.name: Wings of Nightmare
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Nightrider</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Her Pilgrimage of Bleak
constellations.description: When <color=#FFD780FF>Midnight Phantasmagoria</color> is used, it deals 222% of ATK as <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> to surrounding opponents.\nWhen the skill duration ends, Fischl regenerates 20% of her HP.

constellations.name: Against the Fleeing Light
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Midnight Phantasmagoria</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Evernight Raven
constellations.description: Extends the duration of Oz's presence on the field by 2s. Additionally, Oz performs joint attacks with your active character when present, dealing 30% of Fischl's ATK as <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>.

passives.name: Stellar Predator
passives.description: When Fischl hits Oz with a fully-charged Aimed Shot, Oz brings down Thundering Retribution, dealing <color=#FFACFFFF>AoE Electro DMG</color> equal to 152.7% of the arrow's DMG.

passives.name: Undone Be Thy Sinful Hex
passives.description: If your current active character triggers an <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro-related Elemental Reaction</color> when Oz is on the field, the opponent shall be stricken with Thundering Retribution, dealing <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> equal to 80% of Fischl's ATK.

passives.name: Mein Hausgarten
passives.description: When dispatched on an expedition in Mondstadt, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Strike of Fortune
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Passion Overload
skills.description: #Bennett puts all his fire and passion for adventuring into his sword. Results may vary based on how fired up he is... {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tap}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} A single, swift flame strike that deals Pyro DMG. Hold (Short) Charges up, resulting in different effects when unleashed based on the Charge Level. ·Level 1: Strikes twice, dealing Pyro DMG and launching opponents. ·Level 2: Unleashes 3 consecutive attacks that deal impressive Pyro DMG, but the last attack triggers an explosion that launches both Bennett and the enemy. Bennett takes no damage from being launched. An attack that combines Bennett's dreams and passion with Pyro. But passion is sometimes overblown, and Pyro sometimes blows over.

skills.name: Fantastic Voyage
skills.description: Bennett performs a jumping attack that deals Pyro DMG, creating an Inspiration Field. Inspiration Field ·If the health of a character within the AoE is equal to or falls below 70%, their health will continuously regenerate. The amount of HP restored scales off Bennett's Max HP. ·If the health of a character within the AoE is higher than 70%, they gain an ATK Bonus that is based on Bennett's Base ATK. ·Imbues characters within the AoE with Pyro. Benny's Adventure Team's adventures are always fraught with unexpected danger. However, Bennett is more inclined to call them "journeys full of wonder, excitement, and beauty."

constellations.name: Grand Expectation
constellations.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Fantastic Voyage</color>'s ATK increase no longer has an HP restriction, and gains an additional 20% of Bennett's Base ATK.

constellations.name: Impasse Conqueror
constellations.description: When Bennett's HP falls below 70%, his Energy Recharge is increased by 30%.

constellations.name: Unstoppable Fervor
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Passion Overload</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Unexpected Odyssey
constellations.description: Using a Normal Attack when executing the second attack of <color=#FFD780FF>Passion Overload</color>'s Charge Level 1 allows an additional attack to be performed.\nThis additional attack does 135% of the second attack's DMG.

constellations.name: True Explorer
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Fantastic Voyage</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Fire Ventures with Me
constellations.description: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters inside <color=#FFD780FF>Fantastic Voyage</color>'s radius gain a 15% <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> and their weapons are infused with <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>.

passives.name: Rekindle
passives.description: Decreases <color=#FFD780FF>Passion Overload</color>'s CD by 20%.

passives.name: Fearnaught
passives.description: Within the area created by <color=#FFD780FF>Fantastic Voyage</color>, <color=#FFD780FF>Passion Overload</color> takes on the following effects:\n·CD is reduced by 50%.\n·Bennett will not be launched by the effects of Charge Level 2.

passives.name: It Should Be Safe...
passives.description: When dispatched on an expedition in Mondstadt, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Cutting Torrent
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Perform a more precise <color=#FFD780FF>Aimed Shot</color> with increased DMG.
While aiming, the power of Hydro will accumulate on the arrowhead. A arrow fully charged with the torrent will deal <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color> and apply the Riptide status.

<color=#FFD780FF>Riptide</color>
Opponents affected by Riptide will suffer from <color=#80C0FFFF>AoE Hydro DMG</color> effects when attacked by Tartaglia in various ways. DMG dealt in this way is considered Normal Attack DMG.
·Riptide Flash: A fully-charged Aimed Shot that hits an opponent affected by Riptide deals consecutive bouts of AoE DMG. Can occur once every 0.7s.
·Riptide Burst: Defeating an opponent affected by Riptide creates a Hydro burst that inflicts the Riptide status on nearby opponents hit.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
When Tartaglia is in Foul Legacy: Raging Tide's Melee Stance, he cannot perform a plunging attack.

skills.name: Foul Legacy: Raging Tide
skills.description: Unleashes a set of weaponry made of pure water, dealing Hydro DMG to surrounding opponents and entering Melee Stance. In this Stance, Tartaglia's Normal and Charged Attacks are converted to Hydro DMG that cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion and change as follows: Normal Attack Perform up to 6 consecutive Hydro strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash a cross slash, dealing Hydro DMG. Riptide Slash Hitting an opponent affected by Riptide with a melee attack unleashes a Riptide Slash that deals AoE Hydro DMG. DMG dealt in this way is considered Elemental Skill DMG, and can only occur once every 1.5s. After 30s, or when the ability is unleashed again, this skill will end. Tartaglia will return to his Ranged Stance and this ability will enter CD. The longer Tartaglia stays in his Melee Stance, the longer the CD. If the return to a ranged stance occurs automatically after 30s, the CD is even longer. He chose the bow as his weapon precisely to overcome his weakness with it. But a serious fight demands that he gets serious...

skills.name: Havoc: Obliteration
skills.description: Performs different attacks based on what stance Tartaglia is in when casting. Ranged Stance: Flash of Havoc Swiftly fires a Hydro-imbued magic arrow, dealing AoE Hydro DMG and applying the Riptide status. Returns a portion of its Energy Cost after use. Melee Stance: Light of Obliteration Performs a slash with a large AoE, dealing massive Hydro DMG to all surrounding opponents, which triggers Riptide Blast. Riptide Blast When the obliterating waters hit an opponent affected by Riptide, it clears their Riptide status and triggers a Hydro Explosion that deals AoE Hydro DMG. DMG dealt in this way is considered Elemental Burst DMG. Rushing waters are rarely seen in his snowy homeland. Perhaps his ability to command water is due to his understanding of just how precious it is.

constellations.name: Foul Legacy: Tide Withholder
constellations.description: Decreases the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Foul Legacy: Raging Tide</color> by 20%

constellations.name: Foul Legacy: Understream
constellations.description: When opponents affected by Riptide are defeated, Tartaglia regenerates 4 Elemental Energy.

constellations.name: Abyssal Mayhem: Vortex of Turmoil
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Foul Legacy: Raging Tide</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Abyssal Mayhem: Hydrospout
constellations.description: If Tartaglia is in <color=#FFD780FF>Foul Legacy: Raging Tide</color>'s Melee Stance, triggers Riptide Slash against opponents on the field affected by Riptide every 4s, otherwise, triggers Riptide Flash.\nRiptide Slashes and Riptide Flashes triggered by this Constellation effect are not subject to the time intervals that would typically apply to these two Riptide effects, nor do they have any effect on those time intervals.

constellations.name: Havoc: Formless Blade
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Havoc: Obliteration</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Havoc: Annihilation
constellations.description: When <color=#FFD780FF>Havoc: Obliteration</color> is cast in Melee Stance, the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Foul Legacy: Raging Tide</color> is reset.\nThis effect will only take place once Tartaglia returns to his Ranged Stance.

passives.name: Never Ending
passives.description: Extends Riptide duration by 8s.

passives.name: Sword of Torrents
passives.description: When Tartaglia is in <color=#FFD780FF>Foul Legacy: Raging Tide</color>'s Melee Stance, on dealing a CRIT hit, Normal and Charged Attacks apply the Riptide status effect to opponents.

passives.name: Master of Weaponry
passives.description: Increases your own party members' <color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color> Level by 1.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Favonius Bladework - Maid
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents.
At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash. 

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Breastplate
skills.description: Summons protective stone armor, dealing Geo DMG to surrounding opponents and creating a shield. The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Noelle's DEF. The shield has the following properties: ·When Noelle's Normal and Charged Attacks hit a target, they have a certain chance to regenerate HP for all characters. ·Possesses 150% DMG Absorption efficiency against all Elemental and Physical DMG. The amount of HP healed when regeneration is triggered scales based on Noelle's DEF. Noelle is both a dutiful maid and a valiant knight.

skills.name: Sweeping Time
skills.description: Gathering the strength of stone around her weapon, Noelle strikes the opponents surrounding her within a large AoE, dealing Geo DMG. Afterwards, Noelle gains the following effects: ·Larger attack AoE. ·Converts attack DMG to Geo DMG that cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion. ·Increased ATK that scales based on her DEF. Sometimes, it's not just dust that needs sweeping...

constellations.name: I Got Your Back
constellations.description: While <color=#FFD780FF>Sweeping Time</color> and <color=#FFD780FF>Breastplate</color> are both in effect, the chance of Breastplate's healing effects activating is increased to 100%.

constellations.name: Combat Maid
constellations.description: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Noelle's Charged Attacks by 20% and increases her Charged Attack DMG by 15%.

constellations.name: Invulnerable Maid
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Breastplate</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: To Be Cleaned
constellations.description: When <color=#FFD780FF>Breastplate</color>'s duration expires or it is destroyed by DMG, it will deal 400% ATK of <color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color> to surrounding opponents.

constellations.name: Favonius Sweeper Master
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Sweeping Time</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Must Be Spotless
constellations.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Sweeping Time</color> increases Noelle's ATK by an additional 50% of her DEF.\nAdditionally, every opponent defeated during the skill's duration adds 1s to the duration, up to 10s.

passives.name: Devotion
passives.description:
When Noelle is in the party but not on the field, this ability triggers automatically when your active character's HP falls below 30%:
Creates a shield for your active character that lasts for 20s and absorbs DMG equal to 400% of Noelle's DEF.
The shield has a 150% DMG Absorption effectiveness against all Elemental and Physical DMG.
This effect can only occur once every 60s.

passives.name: Nice and Clean
passives.description: Every 4 Normal or Charged Attack hits will decrease the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Breastplate</color> by 1s.\nHitting multiple opponents with a single attack is only counted as 1 hit.

passives.name: Maid's Knighthood
passives.description: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a DEF-boosting dish, Noelle has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Ancient Sword Art
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost
skills.description: Using the Icevein Talisman, Qiqi brings forth the Herald of Frost, dealing Cryo DMG to surrounding opponents. Herald of Frost ·On hit, Qiqi's Normal and Charged Attacks regenerate HP for your own party members and nearby teammates. Healing scales based on Qiqi's ATK. ·Periodically regenerates your active character's HP. ·Follows the character around, dealing Cryo DMG to opponents in their path. I use this to prevent warming and rot... of Dr. Bai's precious ingredients. Yes.

skills.name: Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune
skills.description: Qiqi releases the adeptus power sealed within her body, marking nearby opponents with a Fortune-Preserving Talisman that deals Cryo DMG. Fortune-Preserving Talisman When opponents affected by this Talisman take DMG, the character that dealt this DMG regenerates HP. "I am the Fortune Preserver, the Maiden of Resurrection." — Qiqi does not remember these words.

constellations.name: Ascetics of Frost
constellations.description: When the Herald of Frost hits an opponent marked by a Fortune-Preserving Talisman, Qiqi regenerates 2 Energy.

constellations.name: Frozen to the Bone
constellations.description: Qiqi's Normal and Charge Attack DMG against opponents affected by <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color> is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Ascendant Praise
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Divine Suppression
constellations.description: Targets marked by the Fortune-Preserving Talisman have their ATK decreased by 20%.

constellations.name: Crimson Lotus Bloom
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rite of Resurrection
constellations.description: Using <color=#FFD780FF>Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune</color> revives all fallen party members nearby and regenerates 50% of their HP.\nThis effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

passives.name: Life-Prolonging Methods
passives.description: When a character under the effects of <color=#FFD780FF>Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost</color> triggers an Elemental Reaction, their Incoming Healing Bonus is increased by 20% for 8s.

passives.name: A Glimpse Into Arcanum
passives.description: When Qiqi hits opponents with her Normal and Charged Attacks, she has a 50% chance to apply a Fortune-Preserving Talisman to them for 6s. This effect can only occur once every 30s.

passives.name: Former Life Memories
passives.description: Displays the location of nearby <color=#FFD780FF>resources unique to Liyue</color> on the mini-map.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Demonbane
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents.
At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash. 

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost
skills.description: Chongyun strikes the ground with his greatsword, causing a Cryo explosion in a circular AoE in front of him that deals Cryo DMG. After a short delay, the cold air created by the Cryo explosion will coalesce into a Chonghua Frost Field, within which all Sword, Claymore and Polearm-wielding characters' weapons will be infused with Cryo. "A crystal-clear ring, and all is silent. The rivers move not, and the clouds are heavy with frost. The altar gates open, and evil is banished."

skills.name: Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star
skills.description: Performing the secret hand seals, Chongyun summons 3 giant spirit blades in mid-air that fall to the earth one by one after a short delay, exploding as they hit the ground. When the spirit blades explode, they will deal AoE Cryo DMG and launch opponents. "As ice doth give the biting frost birth, My transcendent blade shakes heaven and earth. Heed my summons and come hence!"

constellations.name: Ice Unleashed
constellations.description: The last attack of Chongyun's Normal Attack combo releases 3 ice blades. Each blade deals 50% of Chongyun's ATK as <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> to all opponents in its path.

constellations.name: Atmospheric Revolution
constellations.description: Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts cast within the Frost Field created by <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost</color> have their CD time decreased by 15%.

constellations.name: Cloudburst
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Blade: Cloud-parting Star</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Frozen Skies
constellations.description: Chongyun regenerates 1 Energy every time he hits an opponent affected by <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color>.\nThis effect can only occur once every 2s.

constellations.name: The True Path
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rally of Four Blades
constellations.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Blade: Cloud-parting Star</color> deals 15% more DMG to opponents with a lower percentage of their Max HP remaining than Chongyun.\nThis skill will also summon 1 additional spirit blade.

passives.name: Steady Breathing
passives.description: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters within the field created by <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost</color> have their Normal ATK SPD increased by 8%.

passives.name: Rimechaser Blade
passives.description: When the field created by <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost</color> disappears, another spirit blade will be summoned to strike nearby opponents, dealing 100% of Chonghua's Layered Frost's Skill DMG as <color=#99FFFFFF>AoE Cryo DMG</color>. Opponents hit by this blade will have their <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo RES</color> decreased by 10% for 8s.

passives.name: Gallant Journey
passives.description: When dispatched on an expedition in Liyue, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Liutian Archery
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Perform a more precise <color=#FFD780FF>Aimed Shot</color> with increased DMG.
While aiming, an icy aura will accumulate on the arrowhead before the arrow is fired. Has different effects based on how long the energy has been charged:
·Charge Level 1: Fires off an icy arrow that deals <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>.
·Charge Level 2: Fires off a Frostflake Arrow that deals <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>. The Frostflake Arrow blooms after hitting its target, dealing <color=#99FFFFFF>AoE Cryo DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Trail of the Qilin
skills.description: Leaving a single Ice Lotus behind, Ganyu dashes backward, shunning all impurity and dealing AoE Cryo DMG. Ice Lotus ·Continuously taunts surrounding opponents, attracting them to attack it. ·Endurance scales based on Ganyu's Max HP. ·Blooms profusely when destroyed or once its duration ends, dealing AoE Cryo DMG. "You saw me, you say? You must be mistaken. I was working overtime then."

skills.name: Celestial Shower
skills.description: Coalesces atmospheric frost and snow to summon a Sacred Cryo Pearl that exorcises evil. During its ability duration, the Sacred Cryo Pearl will continuously rain down shards of ice, striking opponents within an AoE and dealing Cryo DMG. Ganyu can bring down sweet rains as a matter of course. But against demons and heretics, they become bitter, freezing snow.

constellations.name: Dew-Drinker
constellations.description: Taking DMG from a Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrow or Frostflake Arrow Bloom decreases opponents' <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo RES</color> by 15% for 6s.\nA hit regenerates 2 Energy for Ganyu. This effect can only occur once per Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrow, regardless if Frostflake Arrow itself or its Bloom hit the target.

constellations.name: The Auspicious
constellations.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Trail of the Qilin</color> gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: Cloud-Strider
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Celestial Shower</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Westward Sojourn
constellations.description: Opponents standing within the AoE of <color=#FFD780FF>Celestial Shower</color> take increased DMG. This effect strengthens over time.\nIncreased DMG taken begins at 5% and increases by 5% every 3s, up to a maximum of 25%.\nThe effect lingers for 3s after the opponent leaves the AoE.

constellations.name: The Merciful
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Trail of the Qilin</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Clement
constellations.description: Using <color=#FFD780FF>Trail of the Qilin</color> causes the next Frostflake Arrow shot within 30s to not require charging.

passives.name: Undivided Heart
passives.description: After firing a Frostflake Arrow, the CRIT Rate of subsequent Frostflake Arrows and their resulting bloom effects is increased by 20% for 5s.

passives.name: Harmony between Heaven and Earth
passives.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Celestial Shower</color> grants a 20% <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG Bonus</color> to active party members in the AoE.

passives.name: Preserved for the Hunt
passives.description: Refunds 15% of the ore used when crafting Bow-type weapons.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Favonius Bladework - Weiss
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma
skills.description: Albedo creates a Solar Isotoma using alchemy, which deals AoE Geo DMG on appearance. Solar Isotoma has the following properties: ·When opponents within the Solar Isotoma field take DMG, the Solar Isotoma will generate Transient Blossoms which deal AoE Geo DMG. DMG dealt scales off Albedo's DEF. ·Transient Blossoms can only be generated once every 2s. ·When a character is located at the locus of the Solar Isotoma, the Solar Isotoma will accumulate Geo power to form a crystallized platform that lifts the character up to a certain height. Only one crystallized platform can exist at a time. ·Solar Isotoma is considered a Geo construct. Only one Solar Isotoma created by Albedo himself can exist at a time. Hold to designate the location of the skill. This Geo bloom has an unusual property mirrored in the aim of alchemy. To rise from the earth, soar into the sky, and become the sun.

skills.name: Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide
skills.description: Under Albedo's command, Geo crystals surge and burst forth, dealing AoE Geo DMG in front of him. If a Solar Isotoma created by Albedo himself is on the field, 7 Fatal Blossoms will be generated in the Solar Isotoma field, bursting violently into bloom and dealing AoE Geo DMG. Tectonic Tide DMG and Fatal Blossom DMG will not generate Transient Blossoms. Under the Kreideprinz's command, the tectonic tide of creation seethes into life.

constellations.name: Flower of Eden
constellations.description: Transient Blossoms generated by Albedo's <color=#FFD780FF>Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma</color> regenerate 1.2 Energy for Albedo.

constellations.name: Opening of Phanerozoic
constellations.description: Transient Blossoms generated by <color=#FFD780FF>Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma</color> grant Albedo Fatal Reckoning for 30s:\n·Unleashing <color=#FFD780FF>Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide</color> consumes all stacks of Fatal Reckoning. Each stack of Fatal Reckoning consumed increases the DMG dealt by Fatal Blossoms and Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide's burst DMG by 30% of Albedo's DEF.\n·This effect stacks up to 4 times.

constellations.name: Grace of Helios
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Descent of Divinity
constellations.description: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field have their Plunging Attack DMG increased by 30%.

constellations.name: Tide of Hadean
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Dust of Purification
constellations.description: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field who are protected by a shield created by Crystallize have their DMG increased by 17%.

passives.name: Calcite Might
passives.description: Transient Blossoms generated by <color=#FFD780FF>Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma</color> deal 25% more DMG to opponents whose HP is below 50%.

passives.name: Homuncular Nature
passives.description: Using <color=#FFD780FF>Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide</color> increases the Elemental Mastery of nearby party members by 125 for 10s.

passives.name: Flash of Genius
passives.description: When Albedo crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, he has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Kätzlein Style
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Perform a more precise <color=#FFD780FF>Aimed Shot</color> with increased DMG.
While aiming, biting frost will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged frost arrow will deal <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Icy Paws
skills.description: #Fires an Icy Paw that deals Cryo DMG to opponents and forms a shield on hit. The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Diona's Max HP, and its duration scales off the number of Icy Paws that hit their target. {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tap}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} Rapidly fires off 2 Icy Paws. Hold Dashes back quickly before firing five Icy Paws. The shield created by a Hold attack will gain a 75% DMG Absorption Bonus. The shield has a 250% Cryo DMG Absorption Bonus, and will cause your active character to become affected by Cryo at the point of formation for a short duration. When she first started bartending, Diona found that no matter how much ice she put in her cocktails, it would never do a drunkard any harm. That all changed when she received her Vision — now she can form ice cold enough to cause severe brainfreeze. Five out of five stars!

skills.name: Signature Mix
skills.description: Tosses out a special cold brew that deals AoE Cryo DMG and creates a Drunken Mist in an AoE. Drunken Mist ·Deals continuous Cryo DMG to opponents within the AoE. ·Continuously regenerates the HP of characters within the AoE. A horrific mix that even Diona considers inhumane. The horrifying foretaste should be left for one's opponents. It has a crisp aftertaste, but unfortunately, one can only feel it on one's nose and skin.

constellations.name: A Lingering Flavor
constellations.description: Regenerates 15 Energy for Diona after the effects of <color=#FFD780FF>Signature Mix</color> end.

constellations.name: Shaken, Not Purred
constellations.description: Increases <color=#FFD780FF>Icy Paws</color>' DMG by 15%, and increases its shield's DMG Absorption by 15%.\nAdditionally, when paws hit their targets, creates a shield for other nearby characters on the field with 50% of the <color=#FFD780FF>Icy Paws</color> shield's DMG Absorption for 5s.

constellations.name: A—Another Round?
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Signature Mix</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Wine Industry Slayer
constellations.description: Within the radius of <color=#FFD780FF>Signature Mix</color>, Diona's charge time for aimed shots is reduced by 60%

constellations.name: Double Shot, On The Rocks
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Icy Paws</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Cat's Tail Closing Time
constellations.description: Characters within <color=#FFD780FF>Signature Mix</color>'s radius will gain the following effects based on their HP amounts:\n·Increases Incoming Healing Bonus by 30% when HP falls below or is equal to 50%.\n·Elemental Mastery increased by 200 when HP is above 50%.

passives.name: Cat's Tail Secret Menu
passives.description: Characters shielded by <color=#FFD780FF>Icy Paws</color> have their Movement SPD increased by 10% and their Stamina Consumption decreased by 10%.

passives.name: Drunkards' Farce
passives.description: Opponents who enter the AoE of <color=#FFD780FF>Signature Mix</color> have 10% decreased ATK for 15s.

passives.name: Complimentary Bar Food
passives.description: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Ripple of Fate
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 4 water splash attacks that deal <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal <color=#80C0FFFF>AoE Hydro DMG</color> after a short casting time.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Gathering the might of Hydro, Mona plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals <color=#80C0FFFF>AoE Hydro DMG</color> upon impact with the ground.

skills.name: Mirror Reflection of Doom
skills.description: Creates an illusory Phantom of Fate from coalesced waterspouts. The Phantom has the following special properties: ·Continuously taunts nearby opponents, attracting their fire. ·Continuously deals Hydro DMG to nearby opponents. ·When its duration expires, the Phantom explodes, dealing AoE Hydro DMG. Hold Utilizes water currents to move backwards swiftly before conjuring a Phantom. Only one Phantom created by Mirror Reflection of Doom can exist at any time. Skilled astrologers have always dreamed of using a phantom facsimile of themselves to ward off imminent ill fate, but Mona must be the first to make such a mockery of it in all of Teyvat.

skills.name: Illusory Torrent
skills.description: Alternate Sprint Mona cloaks herself within the water's flow, consuming Stamina to move rapidly. When under the effect of Illusory Torrent, Mona can move at high speed on water. Applies the Wet status to nearby opponents when she reappears. This is something that Mona can do, but her teacher cannot. Well, but it's not as if her teacher would pursue any matter concerning Hydro Visions anyway...

skills.name: Stellaris Phantasm
skills.description: Mona summons the sparkling waves and creates a reflection of the starry sky, applying the Illusory Bubble status to opponents in a large AoE. Illusory Bubble Traps opponents inside a pocket of destiny and also makes them Wet. Renders weaker opponents immobile. When an opponent affected by Illusory Bubble sustains DMG, it has the following effects: ·Applies an Omen to the opponent, which gives a DMG Bonus, also increasing the DMG of the attack that causes it. ·Removes the Illusory Bubble, dealing Hydro DMG in the process. Omen During its duration, increases DMG taken by opponents. It was from the time that gods first traced the lights in the heavens with their eyes that the notion of "fate" was born.

constellations.name: Prophecy of Submersion
constellations.description:
When any of your own party members hits an opponent affected by an Omen, the effects of <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro-related Elemental Reactions</color> are enhanced for 8s:
·Electro-Charged DMG increases by 15%.
·Vaporize DMG increases by 15%.
·Hydro Swirl DMG increases by 15%.
·Frozen duration is extended by 15%.

constellations.name: Lunar Chain
constellations.description: When a Normal Attack hits, there is a 20% chance that it will be automatically followed by a Charged Attack.\nThis effect can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: Restless Revolution
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Stellaris Phantasm</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Prophecy of Oblivion
constellations.description: When any party member attacks an opponent affected by an Omen, their CRIT Rate is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Mockery of Fortuna
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Mirror Reflection of Doom</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rhetorics of Calamitas
constellations.description: Upon entering <color=#FFD780FF>Illusory Torrent</color>, Mona gains a 60% increase to the DMG of her next Charged Attack per second of movement.\nA maximum DMG Bonus of 180% can be achieved in this manner. The effect lasts for no more than 8s.

passives.name: "Come 'n' Get Me, Hag!"
passives.description: After she has used <color=#FFD780FF>Illusory Torrent</color> for 2s, if there are any opponents nearby, Mona will automatically create a Phantom.\nA Phantom created in this manner lasts for 2s, and its explosion DMG is equal to 50% of <color=#FFD780FF>Mirror Reflection of Doom</color>.

passives.name: Waterborne Destiny
passives.description: Increases Mona's <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG Bonus</color> by a degree equivalent to 20% of her Energy Recharge rate.

passives.name: Principium of Astrology
passives.description: When Mona crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, she has a 25% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Yunlai Swordsmanship
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Stellar Restoration
skills.description: Hurls a Lightning Stiletto that annihilates her opponents like the swift thunder. When the Stiletto hits its target, it deals Electro DMG to opponents in a small AoE, and places a Stiletto Mark on the spot hit. Hold Hold to adjust the direction in which the Stiletto shall be thrown. Stilettos thrown by the Hold attack mode can be suspended in mid-air, allowing Keqing to jump to them when using Stellar Restoration a second time. Lightning Stiletto If Keqing uses Stellar Restoration again or uses a Charged Attack while its duration lasts, it will clear the Stiletto Mark and produce different effects: ·If she uses Stellar Restoration again, she will blink to the location of the Mark and unleash one slashing attack that deals AoE Electro DMG. When blinking to a Stiletto that was thrown from a Holding attack, Keqing can leap across obstructing terrain. ·If Keqing uses a Charged Attack, she will ignite a series of thundering cuts at the Mark's location, dealing AoE Electro DMG. "Humans are like moths, endlessly chasing the flame we call gods and adepti. But this light that I have here is my own."

skills.name: Starward Sword
skills.description: Keqing unleashes the power of lightning, dealing Electro DMG in an AOE. She then blends into the shadow of her blade, striking a series of thunderclap-blows to nearby opponents simultaneously that deal multiple instances of Electro DMG. The final attack deals massive AoE Electro DMG. The swiftest technique in Keqing's personal arsenal is fast enough to bring stars crashing down.

constellations.name: Thundering Might
constellations.description: Recasting <color=#FFD780FF>Stellar Restoration</color> while a Lightning Stiletto is present causes Keqing to deal 50% of her ATK as <color=#FFACFFFF>AoE Electro DMG</color> at the start point and terminus of her Blink.

constellations.name: Keen Extraction
constellations.description: When Keqing's Normal and Charged Attacks hit opponents affected by <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color>, they have a 50% chance of producing an Elemental Particle.\nThis effect can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: Foreseen Reformation
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Starward Sword</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Attunement
constellations.description: For 10s after Keqing triggers an <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro-related Elemental Reaction</color>, her ATK is increased by 25%.

constellations.name: Beckoning Stars
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Stellar Restoration</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Tenacious Star
constellations.description: When initiating a Normal Attack, a Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst, Keqing gains a 6% <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG Bonus</color> for 8s.\nEffects triggered by Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts are considered independent entities.

passives.name: Thundering Penance
passives.description: After recasting <color=#FFD780FF>Stellar Restoration</color> while a Lightning Stiletto is present, Keqing's weapon gains an <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro Infusion</color> for 5s.

passives.name: Aristocratic Dignity
passives.description: When casting <color=#FFD780FF>Starward Sword</color>, Keqing's CRIT Rate is increased by 15%, and her Energy Recharge is increased by 15%. This effect lasts for 8s.

passives.name: Land's Overseer
passives.description: When dispatched on an expedition in Liyue, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Wind Spirit Creation
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 4 attacks using Wind Spirits, dealing <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals <color=#80FFD7FF>AoE Anemo DMG</color> after a short casting time.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Calling upon the power of her Wind Spirits, Sucrose plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals <color=#80FFD7FF>AoE Anemo DMG</color> upon impact with the ground.

skills.name: Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308
skills.description: Creates a small Wind Spirit that pulls opponents and objects towards its location, launches opponents within its AoE, and deals Anemo DMG. This is a little embarrassing, but though the elemental lifeforms birthed through this procedure dissipate very rapidly, they are incredibly useful when adventuring. Even failed experiments can have practical applications.

skills.name: Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II
skills.description: Sucrose hurls an unstable concoction that creates a Large Wind Spirit. While it persists, the Large Wind Spirit will continuously pull in surrounding opponents and objects, launch nearby opponents, and deal Anemo DMG. Elemental Absorption If the Wind Spirit comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro energy, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use. Sucrose used to give names to her volatile Anemo Hypostases, but their line of heirs quickly grew to surpass Baron Bunny the 893rd.

constellations.name: Clustered Vacuum Field
constellations.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308</color> gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: Beth: Unbound Form
constellations.description: The duration of <color=#FFD780FF>Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II</color> is increased by 2s.

constellations.name: Flawless Alchemistress
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Alchemania
constellations.description: Every 7 Normal and Charged Attacks, Sucrose will reduce the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308</color> by 1-7s.

constellations.name: Caution: Standard Flask
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Chaotic Entropy
constellations.description: If <color=#FFD780FF>Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II</color> triggers an Elemental Absorption, all party members gain a 20% Elemental DMG Bonus for the corresponding absorbed element during its duration.

passives.name: Catalyst Conversion
passives.description: When Sucrose triggers a Swirl reaction, all characters in the party with the matching element (excluding Sucrose) have their Elemental Mastery increased by 50 for 8s.

passives.name: Mollis Favonius
passives.description: When <color=#FFD780FF>Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308</color> or <color=#FFD780FF>Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II</color> hits an opponent, increases all party members' (excluding Sucrose) Elemental Mastery by an amount equal to 20% of Sucrose's Elemental Mastery for 8s.

passives.name: Astable Invention
passives.description: When Sucrose crafts Character and Weapon Enhancement Materials, she has a 10% to obtain double the product.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Dance on Fire
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents.
At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash. 

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Sweeping Fervor
skills.description: Xinyan brandishes her instrument, dealing Pyro DMG on nearby opponents, forming a shield made out of her audience's passion. The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Xinyan's DEF and on the number of opponents hit. ·Hitting 0–1 opponents grants Shield Level 1: Ad Lib. ·Hitting 2 opponents grants Shield Level 2: Lead-In. ·Hitting 3 or more opponents grants Shield Level 3: Rave, which will also deal intermittent Pyro DMG to nearby opponents. The shield has the following special properties: ·When unleashed, it infuses Xinyan with Pyro. ·It has 250% DMG Absorption effectiveness against Pyro DMG. Xinyan insists that these pyrotechnics are the apex of performative art, and that they are physical phenomena that have nothing to do with her Vision.

skills.name: Riff Revolution
skills.description: Strumming rapidly, Xinyan launches nearby opponents and deals Physical DMG to them, hyping up the crowd. The sheer intensity of the atmosphere will cause explosions that deal Pyro DMG to nearby opponents. Xinyan used to end all her performances with this move. She didn't stop because it was dangerous, however, but because she didn't have a more epic finale in case someone shouted "Encore!"

constellations.name: Fatal Acceleration
constellations.description: Upon scoring a CRIT Hit, increases ATK SPD of Xinyan's Normal and Charged Attacks by 12% for 5s.\nCan only occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: Impromptu Opening
constellations.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Riff Revolution</color>'s Physical DMG has its CRIT Rate increased by 100%, and will form a shield at Shield Level 3: Rave when cast.

constellations.name: Double-Stop
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Sweeping Fervor</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Wildfire Rhythm
constellations.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Sweeping Fervor</color>'s swing DMG decreases opponent's Physical RES by 15% for 12s.

constellations.name: Screamin' for an Encore
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Riff Revolution</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rockin' in a Flaming World
constellations.description: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Xinyan's Charged Attacks by 30%. Additionally, Xinyan's Charged Attacks gain an ATK Bonus equal to 50% of her DEF.

passives.name: "The Show Goes On, Even Without An Audience..."
passives.description: Decreases the number of opponents <color=#FFD780FF>Sweeping Fervor</color> must hit to trigger each level of shielding.\n·Shield Level 2: Lead-In requirement reduced to 1 opponent hit.\n·Shield Level 3: Rave requirement reduced to 2 opponents hit or more.

passives.name: "...Now That's Rock 'N' Roll!"
passives.description: Characters shielded by <color=#FFD780FF>Sweeping Fervor</color> deal 15% increased Physical DMG.

passives.name: A Rad Recipe
passives.description: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a DEF-boosting dish, Xinyan has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Spear of the Church
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to five consecutive spear strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Ravaging Confession
skills.description: Rosaria swiftly shifts her position to appear behind her opponent, then stabs and slashes them with her polearm, dealing Cryo DMG. This ability cannot be used to travel behind opponents of a larger build. Those who confess to Sister Rosaria will be granted no absolution. All sinners shall be met with the piercing cold of punishment proportionate to the weight of their sins.

skills.name: Rites of Termination
skills.description: Rosaria's unique take on this prayer ritual: First, she swings her weapon to slash surrounding opponents; then, she summons a frigid Ice Lance that strikes the ground. Both actions deal Cryo DMG. While active, the Ice Lance periodically releases a blast of cold air, dealing Cryo DMG to surrounding opponents. Judgment is such a tedious ordeal — much easier to skip that phase and get straight to the last rites. Rosaria was never very devoted to the Anemo God anyway, which makes performing them all too easy.

constellations.name: Unholy Revelation
constellations.description: When Rosaria deals a CRIT Hit, her ATK SPD increases by 10% and her Normal Attack DMG increases by 10% for 4s.

constellations.name: Land Without Promise
constellations.description: The duration of the Ice Lance created by <color=#FFD780FF>Rites of Termination</color> is increased by 4s.

constellations.name: The Wages of Sin
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Ravaging Confession</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Painful Grace
constellations.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Ravaging Confession</color>'s CRIT Hits regenerate 5 Energy for Rosaria.\nCan only be triggered once each time Ravaging Confession is cast.

constellations.name: Last Rites
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Rites of Termination</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Divine Retribution
constellations.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Rites of Termination</color>'s attack decreases opponents' Physical RES by 20% for 10s.

passives.name: Regina Probationum
passives.description: When Rosaria strikes an opponent from behind using <color=#FFD780FF>Ravaging Confession</color>, Rosaria's CRIT Rate increases by 12% for 5s.

passives.name: Shadow Samaritan
passives.description: Casting <color=#FFD780FF>Rites of Termination</color> increases CRIT Rate of all nearby party members (except Rosaria herself) by 15% of Rosaria's CRIT Rate for 10s.\nCRIT Rate Bonus gained this way cannot exceed 15%.

passives.name: Night Walk
passives.description: At night (18:00–6:00), increases the Movement SPD of your own party members by 10%.\nDoes not take effect in Domains, Trounce Domains, or Spiral Abyss. Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Secret Spear of Wangsheng
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to six consecutive spear strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Guide to Afterlife
skills.description: Only an unwavering flame can cleanse the impurities of this world. Hu Tao consumes a set portion of her HP to knock the surrounding enemies back and enter the Paramita Papilio state. Paramita Papilio ·Increases Hu Tao's ATK based on her Max HP at the time of entering this state. ATK Bonus gained this way cannot exceed 400% of Hu Tao's Base ATK. ·Converts attack DMG to Pyro DMG, which cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion. ·Charged Attacks apply the Blood Blossom effect to the enemies hit. ·Increases Hu Tao's resistance to interruption. Blood Blossom Enemies affected by Blood Blossom will take Pyro DMG every 4s. This DMG is considered Elemental Skill DMG. Each enemy can be affected by only one Blood Blossom effect at a time, and its duration may only be refreshed by Hu Tao herself. Paramita Papilio ends when its duration is over, or Hu Tao has left the battlefield or fallen. Hu Tao's Secret Spear technique is based on several rules, the first of which is: "The spear opens the path to the afterlife, and the butterflies bridge this world and the next."

skills.name: Spirit Soother
skills.description: Commands a blazing spirit to attack, dealing Pyro DMG in a large AoE. Upon striking the enemy, regenerates a percentage of Hu Tao's Max HP. This effect can be triggered up to 5 times, based on the number of enemies hit. If Hu Tao's HP is below or equal to 50% when the enemy is hit, both the DMG and HP Regeneration are increased. Supernatural activity by those who have already left this world is a source of great anxiety for the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. In such cases, cremation always lets Hu Tao find peace of mind. The more anxious she feels, the stronger the flame.

constellations.name: Crimson Bouquet
constellations.description: While in a <color=#FFD780FF>Paramita Papilio</color> state activated by <color=#FFD780FF>Guide to Afterlife</color>, Hu Tao's Charge Attacks do not consume Stamina.

constellations.name: Ominous Rainfall
constellations.description: Increases the <color=#FFD780FF>Blood Blossom</color> DMG by an amount equal to 10% of Hu Tao's Max HP at the time the effect is applied.\nAdditionally, <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Soother</color> will also apply the <color=#FFD780FF>Blood Blossom</color> effect.

constellations.name: Lingering Carmine
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Guide to Afterlife</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Garden of Eternal Rest
constellations.description: Upon defeating an enemy affected by a <color=#FFD780FF>Blood Blossom</color> that Hu Tao applied herself, all nearby allies in the party (excluding Hu Tao herself) will have their CRIT Rate increased by 12% for 15s.

constellations.name: Floral Incense
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Soother</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Butterfly's Embrace
constellations.description:
Triggers when Hu Tao's HP drops below 25%, or when she suffers a lethal strike:
Hu Tao will not fall as a result of the DMG sustained. Additionally, for the next 10s, all of her Elemental and Physical RES is increased by 200%, her CRIT Rate is increased by 100%, and her resistance to interruption is greatly increased.
This effect triggers automatically when Hu Tao has 1 HP left.
Can only occur once every 60s.

passives.name: Flutter By
passives.description: When a <color=#FFD780FF>Paramita Papilio</color> state activated by <color=#FFD780FF>Guide to Afterlife</color> ends, all allies in the party (excluding Hu Tao herself) will have their CRIT Rate increased by 12% for 8s.

passives.name: Sanguine Rouge
passives.description: When Hu Tao's HP is equal to or less than 50%, her <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> is increased by 33%.

passives.name: The More the Merrier
passives.description: When Hu Tao cooks a dish perfectly, she has a 18% chance to receive an additional "Suspicious" dish of the same type.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Seal of Approval
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Shoots fireballs that deal up to three counts of <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>.
When Yanfei's Normal Attacks hit enemies, they will grant her a single Scarlet Seal. Yanfei may possess a maximum of 3 Scarlet Seals, and each time this effect is triggered, the duration of currently possessed Scarlet Seals will refresh.
Each Scarlet Seal will decrease Yanfei's Stamina consumption and will disappear when she leaves the field.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes Stamina and all Scarlet Seals before dealing <color=#FF9999FF>AoE Pyro DMG</color> to opponents after a short casting time.
This Charged Attack's AoE and DMG will increase according to the amount of Scarlet Seals consumed.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Gathering the power of Pyro, Yanfei plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals <color=#FF9999FF>AoE Pyro DMG</color> upon impact with the ground.

skills.name: Signed Edict
skills.description: Summons blistering flames that deal AoE Pyro DMG. Opponents hit by the flames will grant Yanfei the maximum number of Scarlet Seals. Apart from their legal uses, Yanfei's seals also come with her customized additional terms and conditions. Well, it's not as if the Ministry of Civil Affairs can change the laws of nature.

skills.name: Done Deal
skills.description: Triggers a spray of intense flames that rush at nearby opponents, dealing AoE Pyro DMG, granting Yanfei the maximum number of Scarlet Seals, and applying Brilliance to her. Brilliance Has the following effects: ·Grants Yanfei a Scarlet Seal at fixed intervals. ·Increases the DMG dealt by her Charged Attacks. The effects of Brilliance will end if Yanfei leaves the field or falls in battle. "Here are the full terms for this matter of life and death — by which I mean my life and your death!"

constellations.name: The Law Knows No Kindness
constellations.description: When Yanfei uses her Charged Attack, each existing Scarlet Seal additionally reduces the stamina cost of this Charged Attack by 10% and increases resistance against interruption during its release.

constellations.name: Right of Final Interpretation
constellations.description: Increases Yanfei's Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 20% against enemies below 50% HP.

constellations.name: Samadhi Fire-Forged
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Signed Edict</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Supreme Amnesty
constellations.description: When <color=#FFD780FF>Done Deal</color> is used:\nCreates a shield that absorbs up to 45% of Yanfei's Max HP for 15s.\nThis shield absorbs <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color> 250% more effectively.

constellations.name: Abiding Affidavit
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Done Deal</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Extra Clause
constellations.description: Increases the maximum number of Scarlet Seals by 1.

passives.name: Proviso
passives.description: When Yanfei consumes Scarlet Seals by using a Charged Attack, each Scarlet Seal will increase Yanfei's <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> by 5%. This effects lasts for 6s. When a Charged Attack is used again during the effect's duration, it will dispel the previous effect.

passives.name: Blazing Eye
passives.description: When Yanfei's Charged Attack deals a CRIT Hit to opponents, she will deal an additional instance of <color=#FF9999FF>AoE Pyro DMG</color> equal to 80% of her ATK. This DMG counts as Charged Attack DMG.

passives.name: Encyclopedic Expertise
passives.description: Displays the location of nearby <color=#FFD780FF>resources unique to Liyue</color> on the mini-map.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Favonius Bladework - Edel
skills.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 5 consecutive strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes.
At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Icetide Vortex
skills.description: #Sharp frost, swift blade. {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tap}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} Slashes swiftly, dealing Cryo DMG. When it hits an opponent, Eula gains a stack of Grimheart that stacks up to 2 times. These stacks can only be gained once every 0.3s. Grimheart Increases Eula's resistance to interruption and DEF. Hold Wielding her sword, Eula consumes all the stacks of Grimheart and lashes forward, dealing AoE Cryo DMG to opponents in front of her. If Grimheart stacks are consumed, surrounding opponents will have their Physical RES and Cryo RES decreased. Each consumed stack of Grimheart will be converted into an Icewhirl Brand that deals Cryo DMG to nearby opponents. "So the waves roiled, swallowing the crown of the nobles. And ever after did each drop amidst the icy waves reflect a golden crown, each and every droplet of the spray shining with its light."

skills.name: Glacial Illumination
skills.description: Brandishes her greatsword, dealing Cryo DMG to nearby opponents and creating a Lightfall Sword that follows her around for a duration of up to 7s. While present, the Lightfall Sword increases Eula's resistance to interruption. When Eula's own Normal Attack, Elemental Skill, and Elemental Burst deal DMG to opponents, they will charge the Lightfall Sword, which can gain an energy stack once every 0.1s. Once its duration ends, the Lightfall Sword will descend and explode violently, dealing Physical DMG to nearby opponents. This DMG scales on the number of energy stacks the Lightfall Sword has accumulated. If Eula leaves the field, the Lightfall Sword will explode immediately. It is easy to sink. But even so, she desires to freeze this oncoming tide.

constellations.name: Tidal Illusion
constellations.description: Every time <color=#FFD780FF>Icetide Vortex</color>'s Grimheart stacks are consumed, Eula's Physical DMG is increased by 30% for 6s.\nEach stack consumed will increase the duration of this effect by 6s up to a maximum of 18s.

constellations.name: Lady of Seafoam
constellations.description: #Decreases the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Icetide Vortex</color>'s Holding Mode, rendering it identical to {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tapping}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} CD.

constellations.name: Lawrence Pedigree
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Illumination</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Obstinacy of One's Inferiors
constellations.description: Lightfall Swords deal 25% increased DMG against opponents with less than 50% HP.

constellations.name: Chivalric Quality
constellations.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Icetide Vortex</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Noble Obligation
constellations.description: Lightfall Swords created by <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Illumination</color> start with 5 stacks of energy. Normal Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts have a 50% chance to grant the Lightfall Sword an additional stack of energy.

passives.name: Roiling Rime
passives.description: If 2 stacks of Grimheart are consumed upon unleashing the Holding Mode of <color=#FFD780FF>Icetide Vortex</color>, a Shattered Lightfall Sword will be created that will explode immediately, dealing 50% of the basic Physical DMG dealt by a Lightfall Sword created by <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Illumination</color>.

passives.name: Wellspring of War-Lust
passives.description: When <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Illumination</color> is cast, the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Icetide Vortex</color> is reset and Eula gains 1 stack of Grimheart.

passives.name: Aristocratic Introspection
passives.description: When Eula crafts Character Talent Materials, she has a 10% chance to receive double the product.
